packages.name: P2B â€” Place From Schematic
packages.description: Map schematic symbol positions (and optional rotation) to PCB footprints with collision-free closest-fit placement and a local optimiser.
packages.description_full: KiCad 9 action plugin providing a modeless GUI to project schematic positions onto PCB footprints. Includes auto/slider scale, selection filtering, rotation import, collision-free closest-fit placement, and a fast local optimiser that tests small position/rotation deltas to minimise target error. Parses hierarchical schematics.
